channel.title: FluentLenium
channel.description: FluentLenium makes the writing of acceptance tests in a fluent way possible using the power of css selectors. Build upon Selenium WebDriver. It helps you to write tests incredibly fast and reduce maintanance effort.

item.title: New FluentLenium page
item.description: We decided to use Jekyll project to generate FluentLenium page. Now weâ€™ll be sure that everyone can find information on GitHub and on the FluentLenium page as well.
